KaiOS Account provides authentication for KaiOS services. The account identifies the user and device and allows access to features such as remote management of devices and additional services.

Creating an account requires an email address and a password.  The user must verify the email address via an email link sent during account creation.  The account will not be activated until this email address is verified.
By proceeding with account creation, you agree to the terms and privacy notice.
KaiOS Account provides authentication for KaiOS services. The account identifies the user and device and allows access to features such as remote management of devices and additional services.

Creating an account requires a mobile phone number and a password. The user must verify the mobile phone number via an sms sent during account creation. The account will not be activated until this mobile phone number is verified.

How does do not track work?
When you turn on Do Not Track, your phone tells every website and app (as well as advertisers and other content providers) that you do not want your behavior tracked.

Turning on Do Not Track will not affect your ability to sign in to websites nor cause your device to forget your private information, such as the contents of shopping carts, location information or sign-in information.

You can help us improve products and services by automatically sending analytics data. See our privacy terms to learn how we handle data on your devices.

Readout Mode function reads labels of interface elements and provides sound response.
When the screen reader is enabled, your device will provide spoken feedback to assist blind and low-vision users.
Activating the screen reader will change the way your touch screen works. Touch anywhere to hear the item under your finger, and double tap to activate.
Stopping the screen reader will end all speech feedback.
Sending Mozilla a report when a crash occurs helps us fix the problem for everyone. Reports are sent over Wi-Fi only.
A crash report contains some details about the crash and your device, as well as a snapshot of the state of your device when it crashed.
This may include things like open pages and apps, text typed into forms and the content of open messages, recent browsing history, or geolocation used by an open app.
We use crash reports to try to fix problems and improve our products. We handle your information as we describe in our
